channel.title: CSS I am stuck :(

item.title: CSS I am stuck :(
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

#container {
	height: 0px; /* make sure to change this to the height you want */
}
#arrow_left {
	float:left;
	width: 0px; /* change to however wide you want each arrow div */
	height: 100%;
}
#arrow_right {
	float:right;
	width: 0px; /* change to however wide you want each arrow div */
	height: 100%;
}
#arrow_left img {
	float:left;
	position: relative;
	top: -webkit-calc(50% - 0px); /* change 0px to half the arrow image height */
	top: calc(50% - 0px); /* change 0px to half the arrow image height */
	cursor: pointer;
}
#arrow_right img {
	float:right;
	position: relative;
	top: -webkit-calc(50% - 0px); /* change 0px to half the arrow image height */
	top: calc(50% - 0px); /* change 0px to half the arrow image height */
	cursor: pointer;
}
#image {
	display: block;
	float:left;
}
<div id="container">
	<div id="arrow_left"><img src="images/arrow_left.png" /></div>
	<div id="image"><img src="" /></div>
	<div id="arrow_right"><img src="images/arrow_right.png" /></div>
</div>

Haven’t tested it, but that should give you a good idea of how to accomplish this.

Read full topic
